9.まだ 他のプレイヤーが|レース中の作戦を 考えています。|<end>: Other players are still trying to figure out|their strategy during the race.|<end>

10.スライムレースの 遊び方の説明です！|<br>|スライムレースでは レースが始ま:
This is an explanation of how to play Slime|Race!|
|In a slime race, you can set up a strategy|before the race starts to determine which|skills to use and where.|
|The Slime in front uses one skill for each set|distance it runs.|
|The Slime in last uses a skill at the same|time as the Slime in front.|
|Also, in training races, you can check your|competitors' strategies when setting up your|own strategy, so make use of this feature.|
|Give your Slime the best instructions on where|and which skills to use in order to win the|race.|

11.とくぎ「<%sCAS_tokugi>」は|覚えているだけで 常に効果があります。: The spell "<%sCAS_tokugi>"|is always effective just by learning it.
